experiment.h File Reference

Some clases and functions common for the all-in-one tools (i.e. tools which can do several operations, like background removal, sinogram construction, ct serially). More...

Detailed Description

Some clases and functions common for the all-in-one tools (i.e. tools which can do several operations, like background removal, sinogram construction, ct serially).
